website_summaries.verdict: Just what you'd expect from Klipsch – a center channel speaker with excellent sound quality.
pros: Features 1" aluminum horn-loaded tweeter and dual 5.25" copper-spun high-output IMG woofers
Provides crisp, clear sound whether used alone or with a surround sound system
cons: This is too tall to fit in front of most flat screen TVs, so make sure to take the size into consideration

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Klipsch > Bose. Buy this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stress enough, if you build a surround sound, you need to start with a good center channel speaker. This one is amazing. Good weight, good build quality and amazing sound. On my system I'm running r26f's as front surrounds, r14m's as rear surround and the r25c as the center with a 10" Klipsch sub as well. The r25 was the last speaker I got in the mail and it made all the difference when I replaced the old Sony center speaker that was still hanging around from my rookie 5.1 system. IMO Klipsch handily outperforms Bose systems that are twice the price. Buy this speaker with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: A Very NICE Upgrade for Small Room
customer_reviews.text: I recently installed this R-25C to match their R-15M bookshelf speakers. I have had JBL over the years and decided, for recent Fathers Day, I would replace them. Both my surround speakers remain JBL. The R-25C has a little better clarity in a much smaller package, which is a nice plus for my movie watching. My Denon AVR-S910W, handles my complete system. These Klipsch speakers have been a nice upgrade and highly recommend for a small room like mine, 10X12. I mid size room would be 12 X 18 in my estimation, which these speakers would work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: teetertotter

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for quality at an affordable price, search no more!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as well as a Klipsch sub a week ago and thanks to all of the positive reviews, my decision was very easy to make. Both were purchased by the same seller and the entire process went as well as can be expected. This center speaker is a big step up from the basic Polk speaker that I replaced. I can honestly say that if you purchase this, you should be extremely satisfied! I really love the way this sounds, especially when playing Blu Ray DVDs recorded with Dolby Atmos. Voices are crystal clear and in my opinion, the sound is amazing, even while playing any DVDs. Totally and completely satisfied with this purchase 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for full size sound...(will not fit in front of most flat screens)
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this oversized center channel speaker. Replaced Sony integrated Blu-ray speakers with this. Beautiful quality, superior sound quality. This is currently in a small living room, can only imagine how it performs in a professional home theater. Very happy with my purchase, fast reliable shipping and packaging! And yes, I had to purchase a small rectangular end table and remove the middle shelf to fit this in front of my entertainment center (too tall to fit in front of the flat screen)
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Installed the Klipsch and was absolutely amazed at clarity of the spoken word and background sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know what I was missing. Have a older Bose 5.1 satellite speaker system with the standard center channel speaker. Installed the Klipsch and was absolutely amazed at clarity of the spoken word and background sound of movies and tv shows. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: N. R.

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who says this reference series of klipsch speaker systems are too harsh and bright doesn't know what they are talking about. Even if you don't like opera music, trust me, buy the rf 26, and the 10 inch subwoofer and shut your eyes and you'll hear every single instrument come to life and you'll feel as if your there. Its truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Arthurproductreviews

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear Quality With an Elegant Look
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my dad who loves A/V equipment after I purchased the earlier version of this speaker from a discount retailer. I figured if I loved my older model the next step up would be even better. Boy was I right. This is by far the best center channel I have ever heard. Very clear audio that makes it sound as if the character on the screen was actually in the room with you. The golden cones look very elegant and the provided grill looks very sleek as well and attaches very easily. It also removes easily, but not so much as to worry you about it randomly falling off. Great speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality; well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a Yamaha "theater in a box" setup and decided to upgrade the center channel right away. Wow, I'm glad I did upgrade it with this Klipsch center speaker. The Yamaha center channel was decent, but this Klipsch center speaker I think is quite the upgrade over the Yamaha one. The sound is very clear for movies, video games, etc. I have no complaints at all....Klipsch definitely knows what they are doing when it comes to speakers.
customer_reviews.author: skrage99

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear dialog - and thats what a center speaker should do!
customer_reviews.text: I've always had big big center speakers. The trouble is they usually weigh BIG too! My shelf under the display is 5' long tempered glass with a weight limit of 50#. Over the past 5 years I've seen it develop a sag from the weight of a 42 pound center speaker. And I can't simply flip it over to straighten it out due to the fixtures in place that hold it. So I sold that ($1199 Retail Price!) speaker and bought this Klipsch. I'm not interested in timbre matching, it's overrated as far as I'm concerned. While I lost some audio quality, I didn't lose all that much IMO. Sounds great, looks good. What else does one need?
customer_reviews.author: Grant County Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, clear and full sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: About 9 years ago I bought the Klipsch HD 1000 Home Theater System. I have to admit I was a bit disappointed because while the speakers sounded great while listening to music, we had a hard time understanding the dialogue when watching TV. Not any more though. This R-25C center speaker was the missing link. The sound quality from this speaker was what I was hoping for when I bought my surround system. We can now understand everything being said while watching TV, and the quality of voice and music is outstanding. The difference is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear, full sound center channel!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic center channel speaker! I finally replaced an old Onkyo home theatre system that had been bothering me for a long time not being able to hear dialogue during quiet scenes in movies and then a muddy mess during loud action scenes whereEverything bleeds together. Those problems are now gone with this center channel rig! It gets louder than I will ever need but provide plenty of clarity even at low volume so you won’t have to watch with the captions on or ever ask “what did they say?” During a movie it tv show.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Laster only 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine with this speaker up until now. After 8 months all of a sudden while watching a move the center horn stopped working. Sound still came out of the woofers but without the center horn it was muffled and hard to make out words. The sound was great up until this obviously. This makes me wonder if this seller is selling legitimate klipsch speakers or if this is a fake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you buy Klipsch speakers your getting some of the best  for your money
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe ,I thought I had a good system . My upgrade to Klipsch speakers and Onkyo tuner av amp and Onkyo 6 disc player is 2000 light years better . Awesome is my opinion on Klipsch speakers . Even the small speakers are miles above others I just completed my system with Klipsch R-25C center channel speaker . The sound is awesome very clean and clear .I can honestly say I have a 5 star home theater system .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jaworowicz

customer_reviews.title: You can actually hear what they are saying now!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old cheap klipsch center and I sold that; not clear at all. I then purchased a cheap soundbar for my center; and that was horrible. I rearranged my entire stereo system; and had everything done except the center channel; which to me was the most important. So I now have 5 Klispch speakers doing a 5.2 system.. This speaker gives crystal clear dialog; with absolutely no distortion and great human voice reproduction. Highly recommended to complete your home stereo system.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it simple
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to keep this simple and to the point. It's tall very tall you will not be able to place this in front of most tvs unless they are on a raised stand or wall mounted. The sound has been amazing. Very clear center channel. And punches well above its cost.remember the center channel is the most important speaker for any home theater setup. Like I said keep it simple
customer_reviews.author: brian woolf

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Dr Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Over my lifetime, I've owned lots of Audio Equipment/Speakers of various brands. Since I started with Klipsch a few years ago; I've never looked back. I recently took delivery of a Klipsch R-25C for my SurroundSound. I had no idea what I've been missing. Clean, clear, I'm now hearing dialogue and background in movies I've watched repeatedly, and never heard before.
customer_reviews.author: Ryk0

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I paired this center channel with the Klipsch R26 floorstanding speakers. The dialogue from TV/movies has really been enhanced. Makes music sound better too, with some added punch on the low end. My wife said it sounds like we are in a movie theater! Buy this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: John Hext

customer_reviews.title: Clarity
customer_reviews.text: This Klipsch R-25C made such a difference in clarity and impact watching movies and listening to music on my HTS. I purchased the R-15M's prior for my rear channel speakers. I was really impressed with them, so I went for the R-25C. So impressed by the quality and sound. I have them in a 7.1 on my Denon AVR. My fronts are Snell CII's and Polk sub is going to get replaced when I decide which Klipsch Sub I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch is simply the best.
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch is simply the best out there. This is a great speaker and sounds incredible paired with other Klipsch speakers and sub. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this Center. I want 2 more for LCRs. Using with matching R-15s and 112 Subs. Never distorts. lots of presence. Tone not affected by the room as much as other speakers I have owned. Sounds like a much larger cabinet. Love the copper cones. Great Value.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the low price
customer_reviews.text: I went from an older Polk system to a Klipsch set up this week. As far as clarity, it sounds better then my old T30 center. But the bass response is better on the Polk T30. Most likely due to the R-25C being sealed vs T30 being ported.
customer_reviews.author: wisteria_82

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this along with a 12” Klipsch SW and it really brought my satellite speakers to life. Was having hard time hearing the center channel but not anymore. Very happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Center Channel
customer_reviews.text: Very crisp, clear dialogue for watching tv/movies. Considering the price and material quality, an outstanding buy. Overall sound qualiry is excellent. Keep it up Klipsch!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely gorgeous with the copper speakers and the black cabinet. I replaced a much smaller center channel speaker with this one. The difference in sound is amazing. Brought the entire system to life.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear voices
customer_reviews.text: I've never known what good sound quality was when I used an all in one surround sound speaker system until I replaced my center speaker first. Voices are loud and clear in movies, sound effects are strong in games, and music is crisp as well.
customer_reviews.author: jolly jared

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Klipsch Center speaker gets most of the dialog with the two Klipsch bookshelf speakers picking up the rest. I also have the 10” Klipsch sub which makes this set up a excellent choice. I prefer this to any sound bar I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Mexman00

customer_reviews.title: Size not too big with wonderful sound so clear and sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Speaker size not too big with wonderful sound so clear and sharp. Use it as Center Channel Speaker with my Denon AVR-X1200W 5.1.2 set-up. Klipsch R-15M Bookshelf (L/R) Front Speaker, Klipsch R-14SA Surround Dolby Atoms Speaker, Klipsch R-14M (L/R) Side Surround Bookshelf Speakers & Klipsch R-10SW 10" 300w Powered Subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: flyersiew

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speakers
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has awesome sound especially using it as the center channel of an amplified receiver. What else can a person say except Klipsch speakers are awesome
customer_reviews.author: dw mi

customer_reviews.title: If you buy clips by their top-of-the-line don't go cheap
customer_reviews.text: Just did not like the sound at all so I returned it. Amazon was very helpful. Accepted the return no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Center Speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this center speaker along with Klipsch floor, surround and sub. This replaced a surround sound in a box setup. I plugged this center speaker in first. WHOA!!!! What a difference just from one speaker. I could actually hear people talking. Great for football games and works amazing with the other Klipsch line of speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Marsek II

customer_reviews.title: I recommend for a price-conscious buyer.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t sound much better than the Polk I replaced, but there is more detail. Overall, there is a difference that is large enough to satisfy me and justify the fair price. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MEDV

customer_reviews.title: It's a Klipsch!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice build and sound quality for it's price point. As i've said in other Klipsch reviews, "what more could be said, it's a KLIPSCH!
customer_reviews.author: dman68

customer_reviews.title: Good and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of speaker for what I need. I kinda wonder why the sound isn’t as crisp as I was expecting. Sounds hollow but I may need to mess with my output on the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Bloomfield

customer_reviews.title: Great center speaker
customer_reviews.text: This center speaker is A mazing . You have to have the other Klipsh to get the true effect. Especially the subwoofer 🔊 🤯
customer_reviews.author: Sherrian Fordham

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: Performs extremely well, great voice quality for movies, sports and MUSIC. I love Klipsch! It receives the power of an amp very well. I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a center channel speaker stop here
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing speaker upgraded from an 10 year old Boston acoustics speaker. Night and day
customer_reviews.author: bobo

customer_reviews.title: super sound clarity!
customer_reviews.text: What I liked is how this new center speaker clarifies the dialogue. What would make me happier would be to get a $20.00 dollar credit for the difference in price from the time I ordered it and it's delivery. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: This center speaker is just amazing with the clarity and depth it provides
customer_reviews.text: This center speaker is just amazing with the clarity and depth it provides. It matches perfectly with my subwoofer and front tower speakers that are the reference series also.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Paired with good left/right speakers and sub, this center channel completes a fantastic setup. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade to our surround sound system for the price range. It has made a huge difference. I am a bit hard of hearing and have the sub titles on most the time. I can get away with not having to turn them on all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: perfect for family room use
customer_reviews.text: big fan of this speaker, priced at or below anything comparable based upon my research, great buy, happy campers are we...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great center speaker system highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome center channel clean solid sound great looks and build quality. But this unit and you will appreciate the quality and powerful clarity of another winner from Klipch !
customer_reviews.author: Rich.

customer_reviews.title: great Speakers for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Sound Quality is good the vocals are far more clear than the other center speakers in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Zak at Tulip

customer_reviews.title: Good center channel
customer_reviews.text: A little larger then I would like, but good sound, just make sure if you have a specific place to put it, that it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great center speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great center speaker, clear, does what it is supposed to do. Had trouble with the delivery as it took two weeks without any particular reason (not Prime eligible), but it was worth the wait as this speaker delivers for a wide range of movies and music DVD/Blu-ray's. Love the efficiency of 98db!
customer_reviews.author: ptbenic

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good looking, but be aware, not the best sound.
customer_reviews.text: + Extremely good looking + The size and weight is good + The sound is not "sharp", but soft for the ears - The sound is "closed in", mid- and low-range seems very weak. Connected to a Denon X2300 and with a Klipsch R-8SW Subwoofer. Read before that the JBLs are superior, but went with the Klipsch because of the looks, and the statements seems to be correct after having listened to JBLs in comparison. We knew what we got and are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JointAcc

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch Center Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great! And the price point was excellent. Most equivalent speakers were going for almost 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding speaker! If you are planning on setting it ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding speaker! If you are planning on setting it in front of your TV it is big.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzie R. Goff

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of bang for your buck here. But I only had this thing for a few weeks before I had to buy new floor speakers to match. they sounded so good they made everything else sound like a cellphone speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Came in great shape no marks on it, I already have this same one but in our master living room, it’s a must buy as not too expensive but delivers great sound !
customer_reviews.author: kyle woodbury

customer_reviews.title: Improves sound a huge amount.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it the sound is clearer for her hard hearing. Takes less volume to hear clearly now compared to before.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, this company has the best customer service around. I highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: I have no complaints!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five stars no doubt

customer_reviews.title: The vocals are great compared to what it replaced

customer_reviews.text: Used this to upgrade my smaller center channel. Voices are so much easier to hear and understand. Should have done this years ago.

customer_reviews.text: Some of the best quality and sounding speakers made. I have a full set for7.2 surround sound

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker. It sounds so crisp and clear. Very happy with this product. I first bought Polk S35 Center speaker but had to return that and bought this Klipsch R-25C instead. There is no comparison with this one as it is too good.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dialogue
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great for it’s size and it was a great price for a Klipsch Center Channel Speaker. I’m happy to say this was a good deal with awesome sound.

customer_reviews.title: Great presence and clarity.
customer_reviews.text: Great for dialogue. Far clearer than my old Advent center speaker.

customer_reviews.title: ) sound awesome now. Added to RP-160m fronts
customer_reviews.text: Wow....movies (and TV shows!) sound awesome now. Added to RP-160m fronts, R-14 surrounds, and a R-12sw sub.....Money well spent!

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch center speaker
customer_reviews.text: This unit is tall. Almost 9 inches. Sound is rich and very sharp. Good value for the money when compared with ,say, Polk Audio or Cerwin Vegas. I have been very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seller and great price

customer_reviews.text: I built my home theater with Klipsch speakers. This center speaker does what it is supposed to do. Crisp and clear voices.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've been listen to Dolby Surround Sound when you had a separate audio processor in the early 1980s this is the best center speaker I ever heard
customer_reviews.author: jedi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome genuine Klipsch center reference
customer_reviews.text: It has awesome sound. Crisp and clear. So far it works exactly as I expected... actually it is a little better than I was expecting. I went to best buy and listened to the floor demo they had on display. They wouldn't price match, because the one I purchased was not sold and shipped by Amazon. Nonetheless, the Amazon sale price and shipping was significantly less than what Best Buy's sale was. It arrived in the same box as the R-15 M bookshelf speakers.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent center speaker ....It really makes a difference on my home-theater sound

customer_reviews.text: Great center speaker. Home theater quality for small rooms as long as you have a sub or two for the lows.
